betterquesting:10.desc:8:
[quest]Dyson Sphere Ray Receiver[/quest]

§6Machine Type: §aDyson Sphere Program: Ray Receiving Station§r

Received energy can be exported directly to the Wireless EU Net/Dynamo Hatches or converted as Critical Photons

[warn]Actual Output Power is affected by Stellar and Planetary Coefficients.[/warn]

Inputting Gravitational Lens will enable §aIntensify Mode§r which increases actual power output. Gravitational Lens will be consumed immediately.

Default maximum Requested Power Point is §c1024A§r Max

§6 --- Details --- §r

Requesting Ratio: Integrated Circuit Number / Stack Size
Generated EU: Used Power Point * Stellar Coefficient * Planetary Coefficient * §c1§r (§c2§r in Intensify Mode)

Every Gravitational Lens will provide §c10§r minutes of Intensify Mode.

Putting an §1§bAstral Array Fabricator§r into controller slot jumps the requesting power limit to: Astral Array Amount^§c2§r * §c2048A§r Max

Max Power without AA: §968T§r EU every §c6.4§r seconds. 
Max Power with §a64AA§r: §9558P§r EU every §c6.4§r seconds.

§6 --- Dyson Sphere Program --- §r

Launching Solar Sails increases §aSolar Sail§r amount in the Dyson Sphere. 
Launching Small Launch Vehicle increases §aNode§r amount in the Dyson Sphere. 

Dyson Sphere Energy Credit = Solar Sail Output (default §c524,288§r) * Solar Sail Amount * (Node + §c1§r)^§c0.8§r
Every Node by default can absorb §c256§r Solar Sails.

If unabsorbed solar sails amount is > §c2048§r, the excess may be destroyed.

Every §a30§r minutes has §c1§r/§c5000§r chance to decrease Solar Sail amount.
While decreasing, every Dyson Sphere has §c1§r/§c4§r chance to destroy Solar Sails | The amount destroyed is §c1§r/§c2§r of the excess.

[note]Best Planet to put the Dyson Sphere Program is §9Vega§r

If you don't install a dynamo hatch, it'll output power directly to the Wireless EU Net

Use a §aScrewdriver§r to change modes[/note]
